title: WR/KR Cordarrelle Patterson Leaves Vikings, Opts To Sign With Raiders | Vikings Blog | KFAN FM 100.3
text:
WR/KR Cordarrelle Patterson Leaves Vikings, Opts To Sign With Raiders posted by Alexander Shun - 
Alexander Shun | @alexpshun 
Digital Content Manager | KFAN.com 
The Minnesota Vikings will be without the services of wide receiver/kick-returner Cordarrelle Patterson next season as it was announced late Monday night that Patterson has signed a two-year contract with the Oakland Raiders. â€” OAKLAND RAIDERS (@RAIDERS) March 14, 2017 
Patterson finished last season playing in all 16 games including eight starts and finishing with 52 catches for 453 yards and two touchdowns while rushing seven times for 43 yards. 
Minnesota will now need to fill the huge void left not only on the return teams but also in the wide receiver unit. Check out Vikings.com for more information and Minnesota Vikings coverage throughout the year! Contact
